title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 6 categories on the x axis representing Streaming Brand, and Unit sales in millions in each Streaming Brand on the y axis.
Apple TV is higher than any other categories with value 8.8, followed by Fire TV, and Roku. Down to category Tivo with the lowest value of 1.2.
The highest value at Apple TV is almost 7.33 times larger than the minimum value of Tivo.
The highest value at Apple TV is almost 7.33 times larger than the minimum value of Tivo.
The difference between the max Streaming Brand Apple TV and min Streaming Brand Tivo is 7.6000000000000005.
